New·Ransford's Software Development StudioDev Studio

Ransford's Software Development Studio

This is my workshop for shipping software safely. We sketch systems, pick stacks, check security, and get friendly nudges from a local "agent". No cloud calls, no telemetry. Just guidance, templates and checklists that behave.

Back to studios hub|Back to software architecture notes|Back to cybersecurity notes
Security noteThis is a learning sandbox. Do not paste real secrets or live customer data. Outputs are for education, not production compliance.
Security reminderThis studio is for education and experimentation. Do not upload production data or secrets. Outputs are demos; review before using anywhere safety-critical or financial.

Ready to Build?

Ready to build real projects? Try the live Dev Studio with production tools.

Studio map

Jump straight to a lab. The URL updates, so you can share a specific view with learners or teammates.

NewGuided journeys

Walk BookTrack through the core labs

Two guided runs for BookTrack. They are text-only, local-only, and point you at the existing labs so you can feel how architecture, backend, frontend, and delivery connect.

Security reminderThis studio is for education and experimentation. Do not upload production data or secrets. Outputs are demos; review before using anywhere safety-critical or financial.

This is the flight deck. Keep an eye on your projects, stacks and risk here before you let your inner chaos monkey press deploy.

Project brief

Pick a project from the table, then export a brief you can drop into a repo as a starting `README.md`.

This stays local. You control what goes into a real repo.
